Pre-Game Insights: The Pirates have hit 137 home runs this season, the fifth-lowest total in MLB play. The Nationals have the 23rd-ranked ERA (4.34) in the majors this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
The game is scheduled to start at 6:40 p.m. ET.
The Pirates are the favorite to win with odds of -142, while the Nationals have odds of +120.
Others: The live stream of the game will be available on Fubo.
The TV channel broadcasting the game is SportsNet Pittsburgh.
